name: The Towers of Void
description:
A browser-based incremental/idle game. Click the tower in the centre to deal damage to monsters. Get gold from defeating monsters. Use gold to buy things to attack more monsters to get more gold.

Notes:

  • Items become available depending on the amount of gold or blobs available. Buttons that turn darker blue are available. 
  • Click on the "Stat" tab for more information on statistics.
  • Click the "Abilities" and "Upgrades" tabs to view more items.
  • The game is not balanced at higher levels.
